title: Test Generation Workflow
description: Learn how to generate comprehensive test cases for your code using QitOps Agent.

steps.title: Introduction to Test Generation
steps.content: QitOps Agent can generate comprehensive test cases for your code based on the code itself, requirements, and best practices.

steps.title: Preparing Your Code
steps.content: Before generating test cases, make sure your code is well-documented with comments explaining the purpose and behavior of functions and classes.

steps.title: Basic Test Generation
steps.content: Let's start with basic test generation for a file. The test-gen command requires a path to the file you want to generate tests for.
steps.expected_action: Try generating test cases for a file using the example command

steps.title: Customizing Test Format
steps.content: You can customize the format of the generated tests using the --format option. Supported formats include markdown, yaml, and robot.
steps.expected_action: Try generating test cases in YAML format

steps.title: Using Sources
steps.content: You can specify sources to use for test generation using the --sources option. Sources provide additional context for test generation.
steps.expected_action: Try generating test cases with specific sources

steps.title: Using Personas
steps.content: You can specify personas to use for test generation using the --personas option. Personas provide different perspectives on testing.
steps.expected_action: Try generating test cases with a specific persona

steps.title: Reviewing Generated Tests
steps.content: After generating tests, review them to ensure they cover all important scenarios and edge cases. You may need to modify or add tests based on your specific requirements.

steps.title: Saving and Implementing Tests
steps.content: Save the generated tests to a file and implement them in your test framework. QitOps generates test cases in a format that can be easily adapted to your testing framework.

steps.title: Congratulations!
steps.content: You've completed the test generation workflow tutorial! You now know how to generate comprehensive test cases for your code using QitOps Agent.
